Once per turn, if your opponent controls a monster with 3000 or more ATK, and it is the highest ATK on the field, you can Xyz Summon "Stardrake of Gravitic Coils" by using 1 monster you control with the lowest ATK or DEF (your choice, if tied) as material. Cannot be used as Xyz or Link Material. While this Xyz Summoned card is on the field, your opponent cannot target other monsters for attacks.
